Brief description: Labeled sound recordings of sounds like air conditioners, car horns and children playing.
Preprocessing: Sorted into folders by class of events as well as metadata in a JSON file and annotations in a CSV file.
Reference: Salamon, Justin, Jacoby, Christopher, Bello, Juan Pablo. "A dataset and taxonomy for urban sound research." Proceedings of the ACM International Conference on Multimedia. ACM, 2014.year=2015
Creator: J. Salamon et al.

Brief description: 10-second sound snippets from YouTube videos, and an ontology of over 500 labels.
Reference: Gemmeke, Jort F., et al. "Audio Set: An ontology and human-labeled dataset for audio events." IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing (ICASSP). 2017.
Creator: J. Gemmeke et al., Google

Brief description: Audio from environmental monitoring stations, plus crowdsourced recordings
Creator: Queen Mary University and IEEE Signal Processing Society

Brief description: Audio from WSJ0 mixed with noise recorded in the San Francisco Bay Area
Preprocessing: Noise clips matched to WSJ0 clips
Reference: Wichern, G., et al. "WHAM!: Extending Speech Separation to Noisy Environments", Interspeech, 2019,
Creator: Wichern, G., et al., Whisper and MERL

Brief description: 4,981 audio samples of 15 to 30 seconds long, each audio sample having five different captions of eight to 20 words long.
Reference: Drossos, K., Lipping, S., and Virtanen, T. "Clotho: An Audio Captioning Dataset" IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing (ICASSP). 2020.Drossos, K., Lipping, S., and Virtanen, T. (2019). Clotho dataset (Version 1.0) [Data set]. Zenodo. http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3490684
Creator: K. Drossos, S. Lipping, and T. Virtanen
